channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for AK
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for AK

item.title: Report X-2023120800
item.description:
Report X-2023120800

Identified by scraper @ 2024-01-10T15:11:16+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-12-17
  • City: FAI
  • State: AK
  • Report Type: Undeclared Shipment with no Release
  • Mode Of Transportation: Air
  • Carrier/Reporter: ALASKA AIRLINES
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: The bottom of the tote container broke and the bag of potassium permanganate fell out. Ramp agent notified cargo agent when they came down to import previous day flights. Ramp agent had also filed a GIR but did not have any of the shippers information for the GIR. Since the initial discovery we searched the totes and found other DG

item.title: Report X-2023120789
item.description:
Report X-2023120789

Identified by scraper @ 2024-01-10T15:11:16+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-12-11
  • City: ANC
  • State: AK
  • Report Type: Undeclared Shipment with no Release
  • Mode Of Transportation: Air
  • Carrier/Reporter: ALASKA AIRLINES
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: X RAYED SHIPMENT. SAW AN OUTLINE THAT LOOKED LIKE A BATTERY. CHECKED THE BOX TO SEE IF THERE WERE ANY RELEVANT LABELS OR WRITINGS. THERE WERE NONE. PERFORMED PHYSICAL SEARCH AND CONFIRMED IT WAS A NON SPILLABLE BATTERY. TOO HEAVY TO REMOVE FROM BOX TO TAKE PICTURES OF ALL SIDES OF NON SPILLABLE BATTERY.

item.title: Report X-2024010047
item.description:
Report X-2024010047

Identified by scraper @ 2024-01-09T06:14:28+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-12-29
  • City: ANCHORAGE
  • State: AK
  • Report Type: Undeclared Shipment with no Release
  • Mode Of Transportation: Air
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE CO.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: IN ANCHORAGE, ALASKA DURING DOCUMENT SEARCH FOUR PACKAGES WERE SUSPECTED TO CONTAIN DANGEROUS GOODS. UPON INSPECTION OF THE INNER CONTENTS DISCOVERED (96) BEATS SOLO3 ON-EAR WIRELESS HEADPHONES CONTAINING LITHIUM-ION BATTERIES. THREE PACKAGES CONTAINED (25) SOLO3 BEATS HEADPHONES AND ONE PACKAGE CONTAINED (21) SOLO3 BEATS HEADPHONES. THERE ARE NO DANGEROUS GOODS MARKS OR LABELS ON THE OUTER BOXES. ADDITIONAL TRACKING NUMBERS TO THE SAME CONSIGNEE ARE 1Z3V45R26724273863, 1Z3V45R26738401475 AND 1Z3V45R26728213287.
